channel.title: How long is invitation link valid?
channel.description: I often invite my colleagues to redash, but some people doesn't come to the office everyday, and sometimes they say the invitation link has expired and can't log in. How long is the link valid? And if it expires, is it the only way to send "password reset" mail?

item.title: How long is invitation link valid?
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
You can control this in your settings. It’s a value in seconds. It defaults to one week 60 * 60 * 24 * 7.

settings.INVITATION_TOKEN_MAX_AGE
